Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Ceftriaxone (0.5-64 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with Ceftriaxone panels for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates from pure culture, and most Gram-positive bacteria isolates from the genera Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus.
